dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :P_IMPORT_EXPORT import_export, :P_SAIL_STATUS sail_status, :P_FROM_DATE from_date, :P_TO_DATE to_date FROM DUAL

SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, (SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(ssu.received_weight),0), '999,999,990')) || ' ' || ssu.received_weight_uom FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY ssu.received_weight_uom) gross_wt_total, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight,0),'999,999,990')) || ' ' || s.total_net_weight_uom_code net_wt_total, sref1.shipment_refnum_value bill_num, sref2.shipment_refnum_value bill_date, sref3.shipment_refnum_value inv_num, sref4.shipment_refnum_value inv_date, TRIM((CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) voyage_name, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc_pr(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid) discharge_port, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province((SELECT DISTINCT loc1.location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorj1 INNER JOIN order_release orel1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = orel1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON orel1.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid)) final_destination, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID',cv.source_location_gid) load_port, 'TSFE' || j.job_xid hbl_no FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER INVOICE DATE' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_name, NVL((SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(ssu.received_weight),0), '999,999,990')) || ' ' || ssu.received_weight_uom FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY ssu.received_weight_uom), 'Data Missing in System') gross_wt_total, NVL(TRIM(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight,0),'999,999,990')) || ' ' || s.total_net_weight_uom_code), 'Data Missing in System') net_wt_total, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') bill_num, NVL(sref2.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') bill_date, NVL(sref3.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') inv_num, NVL(sref4.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') inv_date, NVL(TRIM( (CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') voyage_name, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') sail_date, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') discharge_port, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province((SELECT DISTINCT loc1.location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorj1 INNER JOIN order_release orel1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = orel1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON orel1.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid)), 'Data Missing in System') final_destination, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID',cv.source_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') load_port, 'TSFE' || j.job_xid hbl_no FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER BILL DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPER INVOICE DATE' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3 container_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 19 THEN 'LCL' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20 THEN '20 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 21 THEN '20 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40 THEN '40 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 41 THEN '40 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 42 THEN '40 FT High Cube' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 45 THEN '45 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 46 THEN '45 FT Reefer' ELSE 'Data Missing in System' END) ELSE (CASE WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 19 THEN 'LCL' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20 THEN '20 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 21 THEN '20 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40 THEN '40 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 41 THEN '40 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 42 THEN '40 FT High Cube' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 45 THEN '45 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 46 THEN '45 FT Reefer' END) END) cont_size, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(ssu.tag_1,'Data Missing in System') ELSE ssu.tag_1 END) line_seal_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2') END) custom_seal_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN ssu.received_weight * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN ssu.received_weight WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (ssu.received_weight * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN ssu.received_weight * 1000 ELSE ssu.received_weight END),'999,999,990'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN ssu.received_weight * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN ssu.received_weight WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (ssu.received_weight * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN ssu.received_weight * 1000 ELSE ssu.received_weight END),'999,999,990') END) gross_wt_kg, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT') END) package_count FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) "ROW_COUNT" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3 container_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20 THEN '20 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 21 THEN '20 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40 THEN '40 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 41 THEN '40 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 42 THEN '40 FT High Cube' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 45 THEN '45 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 46 THEN '45 FT Reefer' ELSE 'Data Missing in System' END) ELSE (CASE WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 20 THEN '20 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 21 THEN '20 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 40 THEN '40 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 41 THEN '40 FT Reefer' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 42 THEN '40 FT High Cube' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 45 THEN '45 FT Standard' WHEN ssu.received_ship_unit_count = 46 THEN '45 FT Reefer' END) END) cont_size, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(ssu.tag_1,'Data Missing in System') ELSE ssu.tag_1 END) line_seal_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2') END) custom_seal_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN ssu.received_weight * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN ssu.received_weight WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (ssu.received_weight * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN ssu.received_weight * 1000 ELSE ssu.received_weight END),'999,999,990'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN ssu.received_weight * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN ssu.received_weight WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (ssu.received_weight * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN ssu.received_weight * 1000 ELSE ssu.received_weight END),'999,999,990') END) gross_wt_kg, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT'),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT') END) package_count FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid ASC )

SELECT LISTAGG( TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.counter), '999,999,990') || ' ' || (CASE WHEN SUM(a.counter) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) END)),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.p_type) packages_total FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) counter, TRIM(ssur2.refnum_value) p_type FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a GROUP BY a.p_type
